data.name: Metin2-Power Booster Pack
data.detailed_description:
Metin2 – Power Booster Pack


The Power Booster Pack helps you to skill up fast and also gives you a loyal pet with some powerful bonuses to stand by your side. Catapult yourself to the top!

Your Power Booster Pack contains:


Frost Rufus (30 days)
Cold snout, big heart – this cute snow wolf will strengthen you for 30 days as your loyal companion with +15% physical and magical damage as well as +1500 hit points.

10x Concentrated Reading
Increases your chance of mastering a new skill.

30x Exorcism Scroll
Learn new skills without the frustrating waiting time.

50x Researcher's Elixir
NPC Chaegirab is picky – increase his acceptance of items to be able to complete the Biologist’s quest.

Important:

  • The items will be bound to the account which you log into Metin2 with after purchase.
  • Visit the item shop in the game afterwards and open your item depot to deliver your items.
  • You may only purchase the Power Booster Pack once per account.

data.short_description: The Power Booster Pack helps you to skill up fast and also gives you a loyal pet with some powerful bonuses to stand by your side. Catapult yourself to the top!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Greek, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Czech, Turkish, Hungarian, Danish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7, Win 8 (Runs on Windows XP and up; no support offered.)
  • Processor: Pentium 3 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with more than 32 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Support DirectX 9.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 7, Win 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with more than 64 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Support DirectX 9.0
